description: The iA17 is a unique color changing alarm clock radio for iPhone and iPod. Wake or sleep to your own music or FM radio accompanied by the 'Wake-to-Color' feature, displaying an array of soothing yet energizing lights. Reson8 speaker technology with a passive subwoofer provides bold stereo sound. Sync to your iPhone's clock with a touch of a button for fast and accurate time setting. Works with free iHome+Sleep app to add custom alarms, social media and more. Add color and excitement to your music with the color changing LED's. Perfect for parties or setting the mood while listening at home. A line-in jack allows you to play any audio source.
title: iHome iA17WZC Color Changing 30-Pin iPod/iPhone Alarm Clock Speaker Dock
